Welcome to the sBitx 64 Bit project Wiki.

Here you will find some common questions answered and procedures to ensure that you are on your way to enjoy the new features and performance of the sBitx transceiver.

This Wiki will be populated over time so please be patient. The sBitx 64 bit development project is not affiliated with HF Signals; rather it is developed, enhanced, and supported by a group of volunteer developers lead by W9JES.
